gamerule.enableMeleeEffectUpgrading.desc: While bleeding, player get Bleed II with increased duration after getting damage from melee attack
gamerule.enableArrowEffectUpgrading.desc: While bleeding, player get Bleed II with increased duration after getting damage from arrow
gamerule.enableDarknessAtLowHp: Player gets darkness after taking damage at low HP
gamerule.meleeBleedLength: Length of bleeding from melee attacks
gamerule.healthLossLength: Length of health loss from spider attacks
